mapper.select: SELECT t_security.id as id, t_shares.holder as username, t_security.securityname as securityname, t_security.securitypassward as securitypassward, t_security.company as company, t_security.dataid as dataid, t_security.starttime as starttime, t_security.endtime as endtime FROM t_security inner join t_shares on t_security.userid = t_shares.userid inner join t_role on t_security.id = t_role.roleid
